author: Vincenzo Inserra

text: I had a dream tonight. Dante(from devil may cry) was defeated in his DT form by Urizen. Then he falls on the ground unconcious and starts having flashbacks about his family. While he sleeps this song is playing in, and at 0:55 the ghost of Eva starts singing this lullaby to kid ghost Dante to calm him down while Mundus is coming to kill her, then from 1:40 the ghosts disappear and Dante starts having flashbacks about Sparda and Eva getting tortured by Mundus and then he falls in a hole in his house. In that hole he sees heaven and all his family(except Nero and Vergil) waiting for him, but Eva says "no" and locks the doors to heaven. Then from 1:55 she shows a photo about Nero getting tortured by Urizen and Dante wakes up all of a sudden. From 2:55 He unlocks the perfect DT, erases him and then the Song ends with Vergil showing up just like in the final trailer and Dante and Nero looking at him.
